title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1572/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3537/89 on the marketing stage to which the average price for pig carcases refers
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EC) No 1572/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3537/89 on the marketing  stage to which the average price for pig carcases refers
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 of 29 October 1975 on the common organization  of the market in pigmeat  (1), as last amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 3290/94  (2), and  in particular Article 4 (6) thereof,
Whereas Council Regulation (EC) No 1541/95 of 29 June 95 fixing the basic price and the standard  quality for slaughtered pigs for the period 1 July 1995 to 30 June 1996  (3), has fixed grade E as  the standard quality for carcases weighing 60 to less than 120 kilograms; whereas it is  consequently necessary to introduce this modification into Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3537/89   (4), which fixes the standard of pig carcases to be used to determine the Community market price  for pig carcases;
Whereas the measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the  Management Committee for Pigmeat,
main_body: In the first indent of Article 2 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 3537/89,  'grade U` is replaced by 'grade E`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
